--- title: Flexor Hallucis Longus (FHL) --- :::{layout-ncol="2"} ![Schematic of Deep Flexors of the Posterior Compartment of the Leg
1: Tibialis Posterior
2: FDL
3: FHL
4: Popliteus @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020](/The Archive/Anatomy/Skeletal Muscles/Lower limb muscles/Knee and Lower Leg/Posterior compartment/images/gilroyatlas fig32.24a Schematic Posterior compartment of the leg deep flexors.png) ![Deep Flexors of the Posterior Compartment of the Leg @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020](/The Archive/Anatomy/Skeletal Muscles/Lower limb muscles/Knee and Lower Leg/Posterior compartment/images/gilroyatlas fig32.24b Posterior compartment of the leg deep flexors.png) ::: # Overview ::: {#tbl-oian .cell message='false' execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
Flexor hallucis longus Posterior distal 2/3 of Fibula
IO membrane		 Base of 1st Distal Phalanx Tibial n.
L5 - S2		 TCJ: PF
STJ: Inversion
1st Toe: MTP Flexion, IP Flexion
``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - Fibula (posterior distal two thirds) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - IO membrane (adjacent) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} 1st distal phalanx (base) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Tibial N.]({{< var ref-tibial-nerve.path >}}) ([L5]({{< var ref-nerve-root.l5 >}}), [S1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s1 >}}), [S2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s2 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **TCJ**: PF @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **STJ**: INV @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **MTP and IP 1st toe**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # MMT "The FHB VIDEO and FHL muscles VIDEO produce MTP joint flexion and IP joint flexion. The foot is maintained in midposition. The first metatarsal is stabilized, and resistance is applied beneath the proximal and distal phalanx of the great toe into toe extension." @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020 # Pails & Rails {#pails-rails} ::: {.columns} ::: {.column} ## P.A.I.L.'s - Plantarflexion - Inversion - 1st MTP/IP flexion ::: ::: {.column} ## R.A.I.L.'s - Dorsiflexion - Eversion - 1st toe MTP/IP extension ::: ::: # Stretch {#stretch} - [3D Calf Stretch]({{< var ref-3d-calf-stretch.path >}})
